name: Nkosi Nkululeko
bio: Nkosi Nkululeko is the recipient of fellowships from Poets House, the Watering Hole, and Callaloo. He is a Pushcart Prize nominee and was a finalist for the 2016 Winter Tangerine Awards for Poetry. His work has appeared in Apogee, the Collagist, Third Coast, Pank, VINYL, and Best American Poetry 2018. He lives in Harlem, in New York City.
